news.content:
Introducing TF Chain and an updated (pay-as-you-go) billing model!

Learn more about why blockchain technology is important within ThreeFold, how the system is operating now, and how things are changing for the better in ThreeFold Grid 3.0.

ðŸ“š Full post here.
news.excerpt: Learn about TF Chain, the importance of blockchain within ThreeFold, and updated pay-as-you-go billing in TF Grid 3.0.

previous.title: ThreeFold x Conscious Communities
previous.excerpt: Weâ€™re in talks with an already-live, large-scale "conscious community" project to create their own independent grid of capacity!
